title: Your journey to perfection
subtitle: Refined stitch by stitch—from first consultation to final fit, every step is crafted with care

steps.heading: Consultation
steps.text: Meet with your Master Tailor to discuss your style, preferences, and occasion.

steps.heading: Fabric Selection
steps.text: Choose from our exclusive collection of the finest fabrics for your handcrafted piece.

steps.heading: Measurements
steps.text: Measured by hand to ensure a flawless fit—every detail matters for a suit designed for your body.

steps.heading: Fitting
steps.text: Try on your suit—your fit—and we make any adjustments so every detail is right.

steps.heading: Final Delivery
steps.text: Receive your masterpiece, perfectly crafted and ready to make an impression. We ship worldwide.
